Reviews.Title: AWESOME.
Reviews.Author: MomeRath
Reviews.Content: This is the first laptop I've ever had. I needed something that would be able to handle massive amounts of video footage (video editing is a hobby of mine,) and be able to handle some heavy MMORPG action.This thing goes through high-graphics games and video-editing like a hot knife through butter.On that note, while playing games,it gets VERY VERY hot. The battery stays cool, but the left side of the computer (I assume where the graphics card is,) gets almost too hot to touch, so I had to invest in a fan-pad.Other than that I'm completely happy with this computer.17.3 inches is probably the largest I'd ever want a laptop to be. At a little over 6 pounds its not heavy at all.The screen is HUGE, great for movies and editing. Touchpad is great, keys are easy to find, and its got 4 USB slots!I don't know too much techno-lingo, but this is a BEAST.Very happy with my purchase, the price was more than reasonable!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Laptop
Reviews.Author: David Mustard
Reviews.Content: Writing this review on it right now. Great shipping, keys are easy to find. Fast, responsive, easy to see from any angle..great viewing angle.

Reviews.Title: Good, for the money
Reviews.Author: nick
Reviews.Content: A decent laptop for the price. Once removed of bloat ware runs nice and is sufficient for school and casual gaming. I did have to return my original due to an black screen issue. Have not heard of a lot of this so believe it was just that specific unit.

Reviews.Title: The warranty works as well as the computer.
Reviews.Author: gusthewoodturner
Reviews.Content: This computer broke down twice within the first four months.  Samsung ships your computer to a third party vendor for repair and it can take a month or more to get it back each time.  The second time I sent it in, it was returned unrepaired.  Thankfully the retailer allowed me to exchange it for a different brand.  I understand that any manufacturer can turn out a computer that breaks down, but how this company handles its warranty service is terrible. I don't recommend anyone buy a computer from this company, but if you do and anything breaks down, don't send it in for warranty service if you can return it.

Reviews.Title: For the love of SSD
Reviews.Author: PC
Reviews.Content: Great computer, the only reason I gave it 4 stars is the terribad HD they put in there.  Put in an SSD and you're set.

Reviews.Title: 550P7C is one seriously jacked laptop
Reviews.Author: johnr361
Reviews.Content: This is the best computer I have ever owned. I have always upgraded and tinkered with my PC's. This is the first one ive pulled out of the bboxand been happy with.

Reviews.Title: What more could you need!
Reviews.Author: James White II
Reviews.Content: Everything I expected and then some. Speed, reliability, styling, layout, affordability. Samsung products have never let me down, always professional!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Series 5 NP550P7C-T01US 17.3-Inch Laptop (Titan Silver)
Reviews.Author: betsy3b "betsy3b"
Reviews.Content: Love it.  My first time with Windows 8 so still "settling in."  Have problems with the "touchiness" of the keypad mouse changing the size of the text on screen, changing screens, etc., but I am sure it's just something I need to toggle in Windows 8.I chose this laptop because of the features I need in what I do with a computer as well as the size of the screen and that the keyboard contains a separate number keypad.  I was not disappointed.  Our massive database of family histories along with digitizing our lives, scanning absolutely everything, necessitated the large hard drive.  Again, not disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Operationg system is terrible!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Young
Reviews.Content: I am sure we would like this laptop just fine if it wasnt for Windows 8.  We have had a great deal of difficulty getting used to it

Reviews.Title: STOP, you'll be disappointed!
Reviews.Author: cap'n Ed
Reviews.Content: I recently (Dec 2013) purchased a Samsung book 5 NP550p7C 17.3 inch silver laptop directly from Samsung as a back-up PC for work as my old HP desktop was at the end of its life. I chose the Samsung as it was one of the few laptops with a matte screen.  I rated it a 2 as it came with windows 8 which makes the entire experience a disappointment, Windows 8 is a poorly designed OS, period.  My 2008 Apple Macbook Pro with 4 gig runs circles around the Samsung.  Samsung's touch pad could be more sensitive, it is a poor knock-off of the Apple touch pad. The CD drive is out dated and poorly designed, its very easy to hit the release button and have the drive open.  The computer is loaded with bloatware from Microsoft, Samsung and an host of others which again degrades the experience.  It does have a better sound system then my Macbook but that's all.  Samsung would not allow me to downgrade the OS to Windows 7.  I bought it as a close-out for $799 which IMHO was top dollar, the list price puts it near the Macbook Pro price point,  If you're looking to spend $1500-$2,000+ buy a Macbook and walk away from this laptop.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful machine.
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey G. Maine "Jeff Maine"
Reviews.Content: Wow.  It's a finely tuned state of the art PC.  I like it even better after wiping Windows 8 off of it and installing Windows 7.  Now I have a flash drive with all the Windows 7 drivers for the NP550P7C on it, and my own copy of Windows 7, and I can wipe the whole thing and start over whenever I want.  But I gotta say, this machine is fast, pretty and powerful.  Gorgeous. I almost bought a Mac, but now that I'm running Windows 7 on this thing I just love it.  Glad I didn't spend the money on a Mac.

Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: Jolene Lanier
Reviews.Content: I have had so much fun with my new laptop! Windows 8 required some learning, but the Samsung is swift, has great video, and I love the large screen. I read that it heats up a lot, but I haven't experienced that. I do wish the battery lasted longer though.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: kurt
Reviews.Content: This laptop is very fast and I think it is a great buy it is very user friendly and looks great

Reviews.Title: Great computer!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Webb
Reviews.Content: You can't hear the fan running even when it's on full blast. It doesn't get too hot on your lap. It's super fast and the JBL speakers sound great. The only reason this got 4 stars is because Windows 8 is really annoying. It will switch to another screen while you're in the middle of a task with no prompting.

Reviews.Title: Stylish and a solid performer.
Reviews.Author: Red Dog "shutter hobbyist"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an outstanding performer with a larger screen.  This is great.  I am still learning to love Windows 8.

Reviews.Title: worst purchase
Reviews.Author: usha
Reviews.Content: It has really created a problem for me..it is so cheap quality and always show problem..wastage of money…I need new laptop :(

Reviews.Title: Microsoft 8 / Office 2013?
Reviews.Author: Gregory Merritt
Reviews.Content: Paid a little more money after receiving this computer.Please be advised that this computer comes with Office 2013 trial version,but it does no come with a Key card, which is not mentioned anywhere on the description's page. If you are wanting Office 2013 after the 30 free trial you will also have to buy the key along with the computer.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i7-3630QM 2.4 GHz
8 GB DDR3
1 TB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
17.3-Inch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Series 5 NP550P7C-T01US 17.3-Inch Laptop (Titan Silver)
